      @NotNull AppLocker.Builder      		 AppLocker.Builder.onBusy​(@NotNull Serializable message, @NotNull Consumer<T> handler)
      Defines the action for when the lock is already taken.
      Default value is null.
      @NotNull AppLocker.Builder AppLocker.Builder.onFail​(@NotNull Runnable handler)
      Defines the action for when locking is impossible.
      Default value is identity function (re-throws exception).
      @NotNull AppLocker.Builder AppLocker.Builder.onFail​(@NotNull Consumer<LockingException> handler)
      Defines the action for when locking is impossible.
      Default value is identity function (re-throws exception).
      @NotNull AppLocker.Builder AppLocker.Builder.onSuccess​(@NotNull Runnable callback)
      Defines a callback if locking was successful.
      Default value is empty function.
      @NotNull AppLocker.Builder AppLocker.Builder.setIdEncoder​(@NotNull LockIdEncoder idEncoder)
      Sets the name encoder.
      Encodes lock lockId to filesystem-friendly entry.
      Default value is "SHA-1" encoder.
      @NotNull AppLocker.Builder AppLocker.Builder.setMessageHandler​(@NotNull MessageHandler<?,​?> handler)
      Sets the message handler.
      If not set, AppLocker won't support communication features.
      Default value is null.
      @NotNull AppLocker.Builder AppLocker.Builder.setPath​(@NotNull Path storePath)
      Sets the path where the lock file will be stored.
      Default value is "."
